1.title: 1. Local-Only Architecture (Privacy by Design)
1.content: GhostMeta uses an exclusively local processing architecture via WebAssembly. No images, metadata, or personal data are ever transmitted to our servers. Everything happens within your browser.

2.title: 2. Data Collection (Minimization)
2.content: We do not collect any personal data related to your images. Only anonymous visit statistics are recorded.

3.title: 3. Local Storage & Cookies
3.content: We do not use tracking cookies. LocalStorage is strictly used to remember your Pro status and preferences.
